jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
We’re looking for a person who has experience in doing recruitment for research fieldwork purposes. We need an individual who is committed, thorough, and persistent to be able to engage with respondents better. A sense of patience and persuasiveness will also be needed for this work.

You will be helping our Research Ops Team to handle the respondent management for our research projects. We will expect you to be the extension of the Research Ops Team in dealing directly with respondents, and help us develop a reliable respondent database. You will also have the chance to collaborate with not only the Research Ops Team, but also researchers from Gojek’s many product streams.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Work for any research projects that use internal data pool with internal recruitment system
  • Help Researcher to do recruitment via e-mail/phone based on internal data pool
  • Liaise with Researcher or SPV of Call Center Units
  • Follow up respondents who are already recruited to attend the fieldwork
  • Come to venue when there are fieldwork/respondents briefing running
  • Help Researcher to deal with logistic matters in fieldwork day
  • Meet and greet all respondents who come for fieldwork/respondents briefing, then escort them until they meet the Researcher

• Having minimum of Diploma Degree
  • Ability to work with Google Sheet, Google Docs, Microsoft Words, etc
  • Time flexibility
  • Good oral and written basic communication skills in Bahasa Indonesia & English
  • Communicative and creative attitude
  • Passionate about market research
  • Ability to operate in a self-directed culture with diligent nature of attitude
  • Openness to learn new things and try new research-related methods
  • Can work efficiently - balancing the flash-fast requirements and the rigor it takes to meet deadlines
